article.para: Ubuntu mai ho software oin-oin bele aumenta servico office nian hanesan Word processing no publishing, spreadsheets, no apresentasaun

sect1.title: Programa Office
sect1.para: Programa Office barak mak ita bele hetan iha Ubuntu. Programa Office ida mak koleksaun husi aplikasaun office nian barak nebe usa hamutuk hodi bele halo servico nebe diak

listitem.para: OpenOffice hamutuk kedas ona ho ubuntu wainhira halo instalasaun ba Ubuntu. Nia oferese komptibilidade nebe diak ho Microsoft Office no iha features profesional barak
GNOME Office hanesan office ida nebe optional, ho ninia hakarak ba simplicidade nian halo nia facil atu usa
KOffice n office suite designed for KDE. It is very comprehensive and offers several novel features, including a high degree of integration between different applications in the suite.

para.emphasis: An X denotes that the office suite has a particular feature.

sect1.title: Atu hetan ajuda kona ba OpenOffice

listitem.para: Website nebe toma konta buat barak nebe incluido manuais, guida, no perguntas nebe husu hela deit (FAQ) no exemplu de dokumentus

emphasis.ulink: FAQ-buat barak nebe ema barak husu loron-loron

listitem.para: Koleksaun ba FAQ nebe barak kona ba bainhira usa OoenOffice.org

sect1.title: Publikasaun Desktop no Aplikasaun ba Desenho nian
sect1.para: Publikasaun Desktop aplikasaun ne'e bele fo oportunidade mai ita atu produse publicasaun hanesan NEWSLETTER no PAMFLEIOTS

listitem.para: Scribus hanesan program Publikasaun Desktop nebe profesional tebes
Ba informasaun ruma, ita bele hare iha ne'e Scribus website.
Atu komesa programa Scribus, hili AplikasaunOfficeScribus.
OpenOffice.org Pinta bele halo ita produce diagram simplis ba diagrama Ilustrasaun 3D.
Pintainstala hamutuk ho kedas ho Ubuntu i parte husiOpenOffice.org Programa Office.
Atu komesa Pinta, hanehan AplikasaunGrafikaOpenOffice.org Pinta.
Inkscape hanesan avansado editora ba ilustrasaun nian.
Iformasaun liu tan hare iha Inkscape website.
Atu komesa Inkscape, hili AplikasaunGrafikaInkscape SVG Vector Illustrator.

para.emphasis: Aplikasaun ba Financas nian bele halo ita boot controla ita boot nia gasto ba ita boot nia konta iha banku

listitem.para: GnuCash hanesan ida nebe usa atu maneja ita boot nia personal ou financas ita boot nia kompania nian.
GnuCash bele halo ita controla no tetu ita nia balanco no resportasens.
Informasaun tan, hare iha ne'e GnuCash website.
Atu komesa GnuCash,hili AplikasaunOfficeGnuCash Managemento Financas.
HomeBank facil hodi usa ba accounting personal nian
Bele ajuda ita boot hodi controlla gasto ita boot nia osan iha banku barak
Informasaun seluk, visita HomeBank website.
Atu komesa HomeBank, Hili AplikasaunsOfficeHomeBank.

sect1.title: Getting document templates
sect1.para: A template is a pre-formatted page in which the content, title and so on can be ï»¿edited without further formatting. Many documents follow a set style and so it can be useful to have a template of a particular type of document. Many templates are available from the Internet.

listitem.para: Koleksaun ba template ita bele foti iha internet husi OpenOffice.org Samples and Templates website, bele mos OOExtras website no KDE-Files website.
Template barak mak kria ba Microsoft Office mos bele servico. MS Office templates ita bele hetan husi origen nebe la hanesan
Template barak mak usa ho Inkscape bele hetan iha KDE-Files website
seleksaun kiik oan ida KOffice template bele hetan iha ne'e KDE-Files website.
Install the scribus-template package for a selection of templates.
Alternativo, template balun bele hetan iha ne'e KDE-Files website.

sect1.title: Ema labele loke dokumentus nebe ita haruka tiha ona be sira
sect1.para: Se ita haruka tiha ona dokumentus ida ba ema ida maibe sira loke documentu ne'e ladiak, ida ne'e ita hare hanesan sira usa MS Office. MS Office labele loke dokumentu nebe ita cria ho padrao formato OpenOffice nian, nebe bolu OpenDocument.
Ita bele salva ita nia documentu ho formato nebe diferente ne'e para usuario MS Office nia bele loke dokumentus hirak ne'e

step.para: Hanehan tipo da Fichero hili formato MS Office iha lista. exemplu, hili Microsoft Word 97/2000/XP se ita iha dokumentu texto ida
Hanehan Save depois haruka fichero ba pesoal hanesan bainbainl.

sect1.para: Atu halo MS Office ba formato padrao

step.para: Loke aplikasaun OpenOffice nian ida ToolsOpsaun...
Loke Load/Save opsaun iha coluna karik depois hili General.
Okos Default file format, selekta tipo dokumentu husi Document type no hili formato Microsoft husi Always save as opsaun.
Repete hanesan iha leten ba dokumentus seluk, depois hanehan OK.

sect1.title: How can I create copies of my documents in PDF format?
sect1.para: The PDF format is commonly used to distribute documents to other people, and can be viewed on the vast majority of computers. PDF files cannot be edited, so your document is protected from alterations.
To output a copy of a document as a PDF file:

step.para: Open your document and click Print (normally found under FilePrint).
On the General tab, select the printer named Print to File from the list.
Several options should appear beneath the list of printers. Select PDF as the Output Format and choose a filename and location for the PDF file.
Press Print. A PDF file will be created in the location that you specified.

sect1.para: The procedure above will work in almost all programs on Ubuntu. In OpenOffice, however, the procedure is different:

step.para:
Open your document in OpenOffice and press
File Export as PDF .
In the window that appears, click Export.
Choose a filename and location to save the PDF file and click Save.

sect1.title: Buka Clipart atu usa iha dokumentus
sect1.para: Clipart hanesan imagen ida ou. Passu tuir mai ne'e instrusaun atu instala no usa selesaun clipart iha OpenOffice.org:

step.para: Install the openclipart-openoffice.org package from the universe repository. The package is very large, so it could take a long time to download and install it.
loke OpenOffice.org aplikasaun no hanehan ToolsGallery
Buka clipart to'o ita hetan ida nebe mak ita hakarak atu usa. atu hatama clipart ne'e ita bele klike direita depois hili InsertCopy.
